April 2025: The solo section from “Strange” by Joe Satriani

  • The challenge: There are two solos stacked back-to-back in the middle of Satch’s “Strange”. You must play each solo end-to-end with no comps, but it is OK if they are from separate takes.

Player 1: Pearl Fiasco

PF says:

Eat 'em And Smile is probably my favourite Vai, and this is one of his best. I’ve been playing it (wrong) for decades, so finally decided to sit down and get it as close as I can.

Player 2: Cussons Fiasco

CF says:

This one took looooooads of takes to get even this close. For some reason the fast hammer-on section starting at 0:23 just wouldn’t come together for me. I’m too out of practice.

The tone is coming from Neural DSP’s awesome Soldano SLO-100 X plugin, and the guitar is of course my original 1987 Ibanez JEM777LNG.

Audience Participation

Comments system: Meh from Splitbrain
